channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-16485] Enable outputName for RS operator in explain formatted
item.summary: Enable outputName for RS operator in explain formatted

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
sample output
for

explain formatted
SELECT x.key, z.value, y.value
FROM srcTable x JOIN srcTable y ON (x.key = y.key) 
JOIN srcTable z ON (x.value = z.value)
